item.title: CA-89 North at CA-4
item.description: CA-89 North at CA-4. Turn left for CA-4 west to Angels Camp and Stockton (via Ebbetts Pass). Turn right for CA-89 north to Markleeville and Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-88 East/CA-89 South Approaching CA-89 Jct.
item.description: CA-88 East/CA-89 South approaching CA-89/(To) CA-4 junction. Use CA-89 south for CA-4 and Markleeville.

item.title: CA-89 South - Summit Information
item.description: Summit closure information on CA-89 south. Information for Ebbetts Pass (via CA-4), Monitor Pass (via CA-89) and Carson Pass (via CA-88). This photograph was taken in mid-June, and all of the passes are open. Carson Pass on CA-88 is the only pass that is typically opened year round.

item.title: CA-99 South/CA-4 East - Exit 252B
item.description: CA-99 South/CA-4 East approaching Exit 252B - CA-4/Farmington Road. CA-4 leaves CA-99 southbound here.

item.title: CA-99 South/CA-4 East Approaching CA-4 East
item.description: CA-99 South/CA-4 East Approaching CA-4 East/Angels Camp. This is Exit 252B (not signed). CA-4 east leaves CA-99 at Exit 252B.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 23 and 24
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 23 - CA-4 East/Hercules/Stockton. Approaching Exit 24 - Willow Ave. This is the western end of CA-4, which follows the south side of the Carquinez Straits towards Stockton. CA-4 is a trans-Sierra highway, crossing at Ebbetts Pass. I-80 continues east towards Sacramento.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 22 and 23
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 22 - Pinole Valley Road. Approaching Exit 23 - CA-4/Stockton/Hercules.

item.title: I-680 North - Exit 53
item.description: I-680 north at Exit 53 - CA-4/Martinez/Hercules/Pittsburg/Antioch. I-680 continues north to Benicia and Sacramento.

item.title: I-680 North - Approaching Exit 53
item.description: I-680 north approaching Exit 53 - CA-4/Martinez/Hercules/Pittsburg/Antioch. I-680 continues north to Benicia and Sacramento.
